title: Dead Poets Society
description: A group of students in a highly conservative boarding school learn to rebel against the status quo and find deeper meaning in life with the help of their new poetry teacher.

title: ELF
description: Buddy, a human, is raised amongst elves at the North Pole. When he discovers that he is not an elf, he travels to New York to search for his biological father.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a genius in mathematics, solves all the difficult mathematical problems. When he faces an emotional crisis, he takes help from psychiatrist Dr Sean Maguireto, who helps him recover.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts. Even as he escapes a dreary life and enters a world of magic, he finds trouble awaiting him.

title: Interstellar
description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: The Big Short
description: In the mid-2000s, a few finance experts observe the instability in the US housing market and predict its collapse. Through their research, they discover the flaws and corruption in the system.

title: The Hangover
description: A few days before his wedding, Doug Billings and his best men go to Las Vegas for a bachelor party. However, the next day, the friends realise that they have no recollection of the previous night.

title: The Social Network
description: The 6:20 Man is a heart-racing thriller set in the world of high finance in New York, from the number one best-selling author David Baldacci...
